programme.desc: Amazamoose And Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Five - It all comes down to this! With anti-goop in hand from the opposite dimension, Rocky and Bullwinkle set out to take away Fearless Leader’s super powers and save the world.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep26
programme.desc: Tur-Bros / The Snailman - During a visit to a racing convention Turbo is kidnapped by an overzealous fan and it's up to the rest of the FAST crew to save him. // Turbo throws a wild race for his fellow insects, but is surprised when his old nemesis, Guy Gagne, returns for a rematch.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep7
programme.desc: Desert - Under orders from D-Structs, Scrappit steals one of Garby's parts, leading the Dinotrux on a trek through the desert to find help for their friend.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep7
programme.desc: A Wanderer In Paris - Odlulu has a magical shrinking key in France and has set her sights on the Great Race. Wally and Wenda help local racer Jacques after Odlulu shrunk his and everyone else's bikes.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Riding Academy Ep62
programme.desc: Palomino Bluffs Riding Academy - On their first day at Palomino Bluffs, the girls are determined to make a good impression. Cue the beachfront race — and a daring rescue!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep7
programme.desc: Prank Day / Adventures In Dinkles-Sitting - When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.desc: Cult Fiction - King Julien resumes his trek to reclaim his kingdom; Clover and Sage find aa self-help seminar led by an old friend; Mort finally contacts King Julien

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep33

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep33
programme.desc: To Heather Or Not To Heather - When Heather and Windshear land on Dragon's Edge to join the Dragon Rider crew, they quickly discover that Windshear doesn't play well with others.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep7
programme.desc: Eep-Over/Thunkytown - When Eep has the first-ever sleepover, scary noises and shadows send the girls screaming out of the cave; Thunk saves the day when Bear Owls invade.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep13
programme.desc: Karmageddon / Chet Gets Burned - Turbo is excited to race on a freeway that is closed for construction, but he needs to complete a series of favors for the crew before he can go. // Burn breaks up with Chet after he forgets her birthday. To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep14
programme.desc: Gypsy Moth Prophecies / Skidzo-Brainia - A fortune-telling moth forecasts doom for Whiplash and though Whip is skeptical, the crew tries to keep him safe so the it doesn't come true. // Skidmark learns the crew is tired of his crazy behavior so he invents a helmet that changes his personality in unpredictable ways.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep65
programme.desc: The Day Before Tomorrow - King Julien rallies his troops and comes up with a plan for all of them to work together to destroy the mountain lemurs once and for all

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep66
programme.desc: Julien 2.0 - King Julien wants a doover to become King JULIEN 2.0 and actually listen to his people. But when everyone feels their voice is the most important the kingdom becomes a chaotic mess

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep14
programme.desc: The Imposter / Frenemy - When there is an imposter in Troll Village, Branch and Poppy embark on a man-hunt as to try to keep the Trolls from realizing that anything is off/Poppy discovers that Archer Pastry belongs to a group of evil creatures called the Party Crashers

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Rupert’S Wild Scooter Ride - Rupert and his friends chase all over Nutwood when Ping Pong's spell accidentaly makes his scooter run away.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rupert And The Undersea Adventure - Undersea adventures when Rupert, Bill and Ping Pong have to rescue Miranda the Mermaid from the clutches of a Giant Clam.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep1
programme.desc: A Time To Be Quiet. A Time To Be Loud - Raa Raa has spotted an exciting new thing in the jungle. What could it be? As they try to get close to the "flappy fly", Raa Raa discovers that some situations call for absolute quiet… not something our noisy little lion is very good at!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep2
programme.desc: The Right Sound - One of the pipes on Huffty's Toot Stick has broken. Can Raa Raa help his friend find the "right" sound to replace it in the jungle so they can play loud music together?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep1
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Cornish Caper - Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep53
programme.desc: Compost Chaos - Primrose can't make her garden grow and turns to Fifi for advice. She is amazed when Fifi points out that you need to water and weed a garden. And surely she can't really mean putting that yucky compost everywhere can she?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep54
programme.desc: Bumble'S Afraid Of The Dark - Primrose and Violet are having a sleepover. When Bumble admits that he is scared of the dark, the tots try everything to stop him from being afraid

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Edubot 4000 - Fed up with Dennis pulling the wool over Mrs Creechers eyes, Walter orchestrates a robot to take over Class 3C with disastrous results!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Dare Dennis - Dennis and the gang are suffering from dinner lady Olive’s completely inedible school dinners. In their mission to ‘drop the slop’, they discover a poster of her past career as a singer. Dennis’ eureka moment leads to asking her to join The Dinmakers - hoping she’d trade a life in the kitchen for the limelight. However after unleashing Olive’s inner diva their mission is to get Olive back into the kitchen!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Edmond Elephant's Birthday - Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep426
programme.desc: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World - Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Potato City - Peppa and her family visit a new theme park that has a vegetable theme.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep157
programme.desc: The Magic Trick - Anna and Christopher are amazed by Ron's magic trick! When Ron teaches Anna how to be a magician, she wants to make Christopher disappear! Christopher is transformed into a balloon and the balloon into Froga!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep158
programme.desc: Go Find it ! - Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, the 1st team who does, win the game. But the objects are not easy to gather: the sun, a rocket ship, or a house!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep212
programme.desc: What I Like About Blue - Hop in for a ride in Josh and Blue's Anywhere Box, where we can pretend to go... ANYWHERE! We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go, and visit the ocean, mountain, savanna and even our friend Polka Dots!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep225
programme.desc: Paddington and the Halloween Mystery / Paddington's Campfire Stories - It's Halloween and there are strange goings on in Windsor Gardens - will Paddington solve the spooky mystery? // Whose story will earn them a camp fire story telling badge and will any of them be too scary!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Pups Save Ace's Birthday Surprise - Rocky and the Pups are fixing an Old-Timey Junk Car for Ace Sorensen's Birthday!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza / The Present - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Double Trouble / Box Not So Clever - In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around. // It's Recycling Day and Sir Steel puts the whole town in cardboard boxes with his Box-ooka device.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Paddington Opens the City Farm / Paddington the Upcycler - Paddington's excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open - will they find them in time? // Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Paddington And Homework - Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep620
programme.desc: Megabot! - Blaze and AJ help their amazing new friend Megabot get to Axle City in time for the big Robot Parade

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S04 Ep405
programme.desc: The Super-Size Prize - At the Axle City Fair, Blaze and AJ realize they don't have enough coins to use the new Supersize Prize Machine. So to earn money, Blaze gets three different jobs, transforming into super-cool vehicles to take care of business.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Finceañera, part 1 / Finceañera, part 2 - Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep522
programme.desc: A Load of Litterbugs! - On the U.S.S. Recycler, Captain Deema and her crew strive to leave every planet cleaner than they found it. But their mission is put to the test when a crew of messy Litterbugs, led by the evil Garbage Khan, take over their ship!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep523
programme.desc: Something Fishy Going On! - Police Officers Molly and Gil are tracking some mysterious lights (aliens!?) that have been popping up around town. With the help of several nocturnal animal friends, they discover the lights aren't aliens at all, they are anglerfish!

programme.desc: Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck / Pups Save a Desert Flounder - Mayor Goodway dreams she's travelled to the mysterious Cluck Cluck Island-a very strange land where Chickaletta is royalty! // Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder, Travis and Cap'n Turbot wind up all the way out into the desert.

programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Day Off - Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket – and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club – going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Ghost of the Living Room - Josh and Blue are throwing a Halloween party and all our friends are in costume! Blue's a unicorn, Magenta's a mouse, but who's that mysterious, silly ghost in the Living Room? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Pups and the Ghost Pirate - It’s Halloween! Capt’n Turbot has decorated an old wreck as a pirate ship for a town party. When the ship mysteriously heads out to sea captained by a "ghost" Ryder and the Paw Patrol must save the ship and discover the ghost!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland / Medievel Tides - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Sky Art / The Great Race - Sir Steel is upset with Lola's sky art as it affects the popularity of his hat stand, so he tries to disperse her artwork. // The Deer Squad have a race to see whose cart is the fastest, but Sir Steel unexpectedly join in with his Steelmobile!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep225
programme.desc: Paddington and the Halloween Mystery / Paddington's Campfire Stories - It's Halloween and there are strange goings on in Windsor Gardens - will Paddington solve the spooky mystery? // Whose story will earn them a camp fire story telling badge and will any of them be too scary!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Paddington and the Party - Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Great Halloween Race - It's Halloween in Axle City, and Blaze, AJ, and all their friends are racing in The Great Halloween Race! First one across the finish line wins the biggest, tastiest goody bag ever!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Truck or Treat - It’s Halloween in Axle City, and Blaze, AJ, and all of their friends are excited to “Truck or Treat.” But when Crusher tries to steal all of their candy, his plan goes awry, and he sends their treats far away from Axle City.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep203
programme.desc: A Tale of Two-más - It's Shipbuilding Day in Larimar and everyone pitches in, except Tomás who'd rather play music. While avoiding work, Tomás meets Pepito, a magic faun who offers to switch places and do his work for him.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Baby Shark's Haunted Halloween - Baby Shark must overcome his one big fear when he meets a real life ghostfish!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Werewolves of Bubbledon! - On Halloween eve in the foggy town of Bubbledon, everyone is nervous because there's a werewolf on the loose! Monster Detectives Molly, Gil and Dr. Pupson are on the case, but will they find the critter before Halloween is cancelled?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S04 Ep412
programme.desc: Trick-or-Treat, Mr. Grumpfish! - Happy Halloween! Molly, Gil, and the rest of the Guppies are picking out costumes, trick-or-treating, and turning their classroom into a haunted house! It'll have to be really spooky if they want to scare Mr. Grumpfish!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep143
programme.desc: The Surprise - They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep144
programme.desc: The Paperplane Race - Everyone is bored today, so Bubu organises a paper plane race! Anna, Froga, Ron and Bubu need to create their own special paper planes. To everyone surprise, Froga and Bubu are still in the race.... Who will win?

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Wolf of Halloween - For Halloween, the Barbababies play wolf and have fun scaring each other.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Ghost of the Living Room - Josh and Blue are throwing a Halloween party and all our friends are in costume! Blue's a unicorn, Magenta's a mouse, but who's that mysterious, silly ghost in the Living Room? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep306
programme.desc: A Blue's Clues Festival of Lights - Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah, the festival of lights! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special, surprise guest coming to our Hanukkah party, and we'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep605
programme.desc: Race to Sky High Mountain - At the starting line for Race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crusher's cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good. To get back in this race, Blaze will need... Power Tires!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Sparkle's Racing Badge - It's more Blaze family fun in this high octane, action-packed adventure as Blaze and his sister Sparkle team up to make it back to the Monster Dome in time for a big race.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The wig of power / The duck who parped wolf - Steel Tower is under new management not once but twice - can the Deer Squad return it to a distraught Sir Steel? // Steel and Lady Fluffpot are putting up a play. Ian's false alarms frustrate Kai, but one of them turns out to be a REAL emergency!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Paddington's Taste of Italy - Mr. Gruber has always wanted to go to Italy & Paddington sets about helping his friend achieve his dream!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and The Bad Swap - Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day? // Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Paddington Celebrates Mrs Birds Day / Paddington The Table Tennis Champ! - It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation? // Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team and the beat the table hogs so everyone can play!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Feelin' Filipino - Lola is missing her hometown in the Philippines, so Josh surprises her by bringing the Philippines to the house! We explore Filipino culture and family traditions as we play Blue's Clues.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Spooky Costume Party with Blue - It's a spooky Halloween at the Blue's Clues house - Blue's dressed up as a fish, but Magenta can't decide what to wear! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what costume Magenta should wear.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Great Halloween Race - It's Halloween in Axle City, and Blaze, AJ, and all their friends are racing in The Great Halloween Race! First one across the finish line wins the biggest, tastiest goody bag ever!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Magic Spyglass / The Stone of Life - Santi and crew are after the legendary Magic Spyglass! But things get tricky when Enrique Real de Palacios III joins the chase. / Santi and crew follow a map to a special treasure, but Bonnie and Sir Butterscotch are hot on their trail.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Baby Shark's Haunted Halloween - Baby Shark must overcome his one big fear when he meets a real life ghostfish!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep802
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sweet Mayor / Pups Save a Magic Trick - Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay with a curious dolphin. // When a magic trick goes awry, the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep225
programme.desc: Paddington and the Halloween Mystery / Paddington's Campfire Stories - It's Halloween and there are strange goings on in Windsor Gardens - will Paddington solve the spooky mystery? // Whose story will earn them a camp fire story telling badge and will any of them be too scary!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep502
programme.desc: The New House - Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep503
programme.desc: Basketball - Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes - There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Cuddle Toy - Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher looses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies until Anna saves the day!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Mosquito - Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Ghost of the Living Room - Josh and Blue are throwing a Halloween party and all our friends are in costume! Blue's a unicorn, Magenta's a mouse, but who's that mysterious, silly ghost in the Living Room? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.desc: Pups and the Ghost Pirate - It’s Halloween! Capt’n Turbot has decorated an old wreck as a pirate ship for a town party. When the ship mysteriously heads out to sea captained by a "ghost" Ryder and the Paw Patrol must save the ship and discover the ghost!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Pups Save the Jungle Penguins - An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep80
programme.desc: Fast Slow Fast Slow - The Teletubbies take it in turns to go up and down on the Dup Dup. Sometimes they go fast and sometimes they go slow - even The Noo-­‐noo has a turn!

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: Rocket - Dee encourages a friend to say 'rocket' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We have lots of fun with rockets - a blast off rocket, a flying rocket and a zooming to the moon rocket!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep40
programme.desc: Three Cheers for Logi-Po - When Logi-Po passes an important test, the team organise a po-fect celebration.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep39
programme.desc: It's time to spot the birds - On a cold winter morning JoJo and Gran Gran are bird spotting. We also learn about bird migrations.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep67
programme.desc: Surprising Stan - Monty wonders whether it is okay to give away surprises when his mother starts to plan a special treat for Stan.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep66
programme.desc: Know It All - Monty and his best friend pet pig Jimmy Jones dance and sing to a song about creatures who seem to know it all.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: Calypso - At school, Bluey and her friends enjoy various games. Teacher Calypso keeps her charges on track with a wise word and a song... all except the mysterious Pretzel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep46
programme.desc: The Perfume Badge - The Squirrels make their very own perfumes with accompanying advertisements to show how their perfumes are uniquely theirs.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep45
programme.desc: The Direction Badge - The Squirrels go out for a walk but can't find a way back to the clubhouse. Through a series of unusual methods, the Squirrels learn all about direction.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep44
programme.desc: The Board Game Badge - It is a rainy day in the clubhouse which means it's a perfect day for a board game. Duggee introduces the Squirrels to one of his favourite games.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep26
programme.desc: Nomads, Mongolia - Glitch offends some nomads in Mongolia, so it's down to the Go Jetters to take the reins.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep25
programme.desc: Gliding, Argentina - Glitch gatecrashes an academy gliding test, causing calamity in the skies over Argentina.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep16
programme.desc: Yoga Ball - Bingo loves playing with Dad, but sometimes he forgets Bingo is smaller than her sister. Mum teaches Bingo how to use her big girl bark to keep the fun within her limits.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep15
programme.desc: Butterflies - Playing 'Butterflies' in the backyard is great fun, until Bluey runs away with Judo leaving Bingo all alone. Now poor Bingo's heartbroken and Bluey needs to make amends.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures (S1) Ep25
programme.desc: Gigantoraptor & Tumbleweed - When the museum's prized prehistoric tumbleweed goes missing, Andy Day heads back 85 million years in time to try and find some more. During his search he helps a mother dinosaur protect her nest.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines (S1) Ep15
programme.desc: Propellor Machines - Grace flies a seaplane, shows off an unusual hydrocopter and goes for a fast ride in a raceboat!

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) Ep20
programme.desc: Uncle Joe King - Captain Captain's Uncle Joe King is coming to visit. Uncle Joe is the best joker in the family and Captain Captain has got a big plan to play a joke on him!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep43
programme.desc: The Soap Opera Badge - After breaking the Chickens' TV aerial during the finale of their favourite soap opera, the Squirrels take it upon themselves to recreate the final episode for them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep42
programme.desc: The Mythical Creature Badge - The Squirrels find a hidden book about mythical creatures. They learn and discover a wide range of mythical creatures, create their own and find out why the book was hidden in the first place.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep41
programme.desc: The Puzzle Badge - The Squirrels are close to finishing a jigsaw puzzle when the Naughty Mice steal their last piece!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep24
programme.desc: Valley Of The Balls, Kazakhstan - Can the Go Jetters take control of a rocky situation in the Valley of Balls?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep23
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Hurricane Rescue - Grandmaster Glitch tries to rescue a Grimbot from an Atlantic hurricane. The Go Jetters have to rescue him!

programme.desc: Jitters and Japes - Thomas is given the job of escorting the Fat Controller's mother on a tour of Sodor.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep35
programme.desc: Hedge Opera - Sarah is fascinated by some mysterious music coming from the hedge.

programme.desc: Brolly Bus - When Umbrella gets left on the bus, Sarah and Duck head to the bus depot in search of their friend.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN's Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live.

programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues.

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on what’s happening in every facet of business.

programme.title: Q+A S15 Ep35
programme.desc: How have Australians responded to Treasurer Jim Chalmers' first Budget. Stan Grant gauges the reaction of the audience and panel to Labor's economic plan and Peter Dutton's budget reply. Will it ease cost of living pressures?

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep195
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: Friday Briefing Ep39
programme.desc: End the week on top of all the big issues in politics and national affairs. Greg Jennett is joined by a panel of journalists and commentators to discuss the big stories that dominated the news agenda.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep210
programme.desc: Kirsten Aiken brings you all the news of the day and a closer look at the day's top stories from around the nation. Plus interviews with special guests and updates from ABC News reporters on the scene.

programme.title: AFLW - Round 10 - Carlton v Western Bulldogs Ep55
programme.desc: The final round of the AFLW home-and-away season kicks off with Carlton hosting the Western Bulldogs. The Bulldogs are playing for a spot in the finals series, while two draws cruelled the Blues' chances.

programme.title: AFLW - Round 10 - Brisbane Lions v Collingwood Ep56
programme.desc: A Friday Night doubleheader in the final round of the AFLW home-and-away season continues with a clash between two teams near the top of the ladder as the Brisbane Lions host Collingwood on the Gold Coast.

programme.title: The World Ep215
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Inside Central Station S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A burst pipe at Central Station causes chaos on the school run and a tragic incident at a suburban station leaves staff shaken.

programme.title: Pandemic Warriors - Staying On-Air S2 Ep7
programme.desc: We meet the head of Tonga's national broadcaster and learn how she and her team kept life-saving information going out on the airwaves as Tonga faced a devastating triple disaster.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep215
programme.desc: End your day informed and up-to-date with the best coverage of the day's top stories and the latest news. Michael Tetlow brings you a complete snapshot of what's happening in the cities, suburbs and regional communities.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep36
programme.desc: Everybody loves it until they're on it! Australia's leading forum for media analysis and critique, we have been exposing conflicts of interest, journalistic deceit, misrepresentation, manipulation and plagiarism since 1989.

programme.title: Home And Away S33 Ep187
programme.desc: Ziggy won't leave Dean's side. Bella finally sees Nikau. Mia is cold towards Ari.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep39
programme.desc: With cost of living pressures and interest rates rising after the pandemic, it's never been more important to keep an eye on your money. Rachel Pupazzoni and the team explain the economic impact for business and consumers.

programme.title: Q+A Highlights S15 Ep35
programme.desc: How have Australians responded to Treasurer Jim Chalmers' first Budget. Stan Grant gauges the reaction of the audience and panel to Labor's economic plan and Peter Dutton's budget reply. Will it ease cost of living pressures?

programme.title: The Drum Ep195
programme.desc: In this ever-changing world, turn to Ellen Fanning and a panel of informed minds for forthright and insightful conversations on the day's news, big issues, local topics and unique personal insights on the issues that matter.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep215
programme.desc: End your day informed and up-to-date. Michael Tetlow presents ABC Late News from Perth, bringing you detailed coverage of the day's top stories, trusted analysis and new details on the issues and events that shaped our day.

programme.title: Friday Briefing Ep39
programme.desc: End the week on top of all the big issues in politics and national affairs. Greg Jennett is joined by a panel of journalists and commentators to discuss the big stories that dominated the news agenda.

programme.title: The World Ep215
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Displaced
programme.desc: In an ABC News Special, Sarah Dingle looks at the refugee crisis around the world. Nearly 90 million people are fleeing from genocide, persecution, environmental disasters and famine. Conflicts are driving this displacement.

programme.title: Home And Away S33 Ep187
programme.desc: Ziggy won't leave Dean's side. Bella finally sees Nikau. Mia is cold towards Ari.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep39
programme.desc: With cost of living pressures and interest rates rising after the pandemic, it's never been more important to keep an eye on your money. Rachel Pupazzoni and the team explain the economic impact for business and consumers.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show S2 Ep22
programme.desc: Showcasing the achievements and inspiring stories of Pacific athletes in Australia and around the world. Host Tiana Penitani will be joined by athletes with Pacific heritage including Sam Wykes, Sera Naiqama and Tyson Pedro.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep37
programme.desc: Join Michael Rowland, Lisa Millar and the team for some of the best conversations as we hear from some of the most informed and entertaining guests who have appeared on News Breakfast.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast: Early Ep44
programme.desc: Start your weekend informed and up-to-date as Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim bring you the latest news, interviews, analysis, politics, culture and weather. Plus finance with David Chau and sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast Ep44
programme.desc: Start your weekend informed and fully up-to-date as Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim bring you the latest news, in-depth analysis, politics, interviews, weather, culture and global affairs. Plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: ABC News Ep87
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep41
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor presents the week's main international news, as reported by ABC News correspondents deployed in Bangkok, Beirut, Istanbul, Jakarta, Jerusalem, London, New Delhi, Port Moresby, Taipei, Tokyo and Washington.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep87
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep41
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters across the country uncover the news and unique stories about what's going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: AFLW - Round 10 - Melbourne v West Coast Eagles Ep57
programme.desc: The final round of the AFLW home-and-away season continues as the Melbourne Demons host the West Coast Eagles. The Demons sit in the top four and look to go one better than last season's Grand Final loss.

programme.title: AFLW - Round 10 - St Kilda v Adelaide Crows Ep58
programme.desc: St Kilda host the Adelaide Crows in the final round of the AFLW regular season, with both clubs potentially in the race for a top eight and top four finish respectively.

programme.title: AFLW - Round 10 - Geelong Cats v Sydney Ep59
programme.desc: The Geelong Cats host the Sydney Swans in the final round of the AFLW home-and-away season. The Cats are hoping for a top 8 finish and a spot in the finals, but it has been tough going for the Swans in their inaugural season.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep44
programme.desc: Mariam Saab presents the latest from ABC News, covering today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and updated news from all corners of Australia and around the globe.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame - Tara Moss S6 Ep6
programme.desc: Best-selling author Tara Moss moved to Australia when she was 23 and wrote her first book. She draws on some tough experiences from her days as a model, sharing her optimism and vulnerability with Anh.

programme.title: Gardening Australia S33 Ep30
programme.desc: Inspiring, entertaining and full of practical advice, join Costa Georgiadis and the team as they unearth gardening ideas, meet avid gardeners and look at some of the most inspiring gardens from across the country.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Hamptons House S1 Ep6
programme.desc: If ever there was an ideal place for a Hamptons house outside the Hamptons, the Gold Coast hinterland would be it. For Steve and Lisa Morley it's the American dream or nothing for their 4,000 square metre block.

programme.title: Escape From The City - Sunshine Coast QLD: The Vautiers S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Presenter Simon Marnie accompanies Dee on her search for a new home on Queensland's Sunshine Coast. High on the priority list is finding a house close to the water which can host her children and grandkids.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep25
programme.desc: The award-winning series with no narrator and no agendas, bringing you incredible and authentic stories told entirely in people's own words. They're sometimes high profile, sometimes controversial, but always compelling.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent - Thai High Ep26
programme.desc: From zero tolerance to decriminalisation, Thailand's U-turn this year on cannabis laws is lighting up a billion-dollar industry. Officially it's for medicinal use but the legal grey area means 'ganja' lovers are celebrating.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep36
programme.desc: The longest running show on Australian TV, this award-winning current affairs documentary series is a powerhouse of investigative journalism - fearless and forensic, holding power to account through six decades and counting.

programme.title: Kurt Fearnley's One Plus One - Robert Irwin Ep8
programme.desc: Robert Irwin has spent a lifetime in the spotlight as the son of the Crocodile Hunter, Steve Irwin. The 18-year-old is also passionate about conservation, talking with Kurt about wildlife and growing up as a celebrity.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep87
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep37

programme.desc: Ziggy won't leave Dean's side. Bella finally sees Nikau. Mia is cold towards Ari.

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: South Korea is known for the intense stress experienced by young residents of cities. To instill courage and a chance for self-reflection, the "Don't Worry Village" program was founded in rural Mokpo.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini

programme.title: Treasure Box Japan: Tochigi
programme.desc: Postponed during the pandemic, the Utsunomiya Fireworks Festival is held again for the first time in three years. Watch these fireworks filled with hopes and dreams.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep2
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Kattar vs. Allen
programme.desc: Prelims - With three consecutive Fight of the Night awards, Calvin Kattar has established himself as a must see in thestacked featherweight division, but the next goal on his hit list is earning a world title shot, and beating Britishstandout Arnold Allen in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night on October 30 at the APEX in Las Vegaswill get him closer to the top. That’s not an easy task for the New Englander, though, as Allen is on one ofthe most impressive runs in the sport, an 11-fight winning streak that includes UFC victories over the likes of Gilbert Melendez, Sodiq Yusuff and Dan Hooker

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Kattar vs. Allen
